name: Therion Journeys
description:
Therion Journeys is a quick little rpg made in 48 hours 

in this short rpg you play as a girl named rayna and her companion  as they hunt a demon lord

credit for the plugins goes to yanfly

credit for most of the Music Patrick de Arteaga

 https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/mons-character-generator-expans...
